subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox beat the Royals, 10-3, on Thursday night to give Terry Francona his 561st win as Boston’s manager, second most in franchise history.
snippet: The Red Sox beat the Royals, 10-3, on Thursday night to give Terry Francona his 561st win as Boston’s manager, second most in franchise history.
